title: What is a new organ in our bodies that scientists have just found, but they may have known about it, but for a different purpose? - Quora

response.answer_text: The supporters of the evolutionary theory used to claim that the appendix was just a useless left over of the evolutionary process. Now science has proven that the appendix is an important part of the immune system. God created the appendix as the “reboot disk” for the human gut - to restore the gut bacteria after it has been killed off by an infection or sickness.
